findings.title: Unvalidated `_lpTokenAddress` Parameter
findings.description: An `_lpTokenAddress` parameter is not validated and reward balances can be messed up.

findings.title: Reward Token and LP Token Mix-up
findings.description: When a reward token and the LP token are essentially the same token, the reward and LP tokens staked by users are mixed, which may lead to the fact that the user cannot withdraw LP tokens in case farming contract lacks reward tokens or on case of miscalculations when reward tokens sent to contract.

findings.title: isContract function returns false when called from another contract's constructor
findings.description: The `isContract` function returns false when a call is made from a constructor function of another contract, making this validation useless and only consuming extra gas.
